alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Chattooga; Dade; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 7:22PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Catoosa, Whitfield, Walker, central Dade and northwestern Chattooga Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 722 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Ridgeside to Noble to near Cloudland, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dalton, Lafayette, Ringgold, Fort Oglethorpe, Chickamauga, Varnell, Lookout Mountain, Tunnel Hill, Cohutta, Chattanooga Valley, La Fayette, Center Post, Blue Spring, Fairview, Linwood, Beaverdale, Villanow, Chattanooga Valley, Cooper Heights, and Rock Spring. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
